name: ROOM ZERO
description:
Intense arena shooter in a toilet sized room with a twist (actually).

How to play:
WASD + Mouse
Your ammo is limited to 5, refill it with white portals and survive as long as you can.

Perfectly played with your favorite electronic music in background.

Fell free to comment and share your highscores.

Made in under 48 hours for #ld37 #ldjam

ROOM ZERO on Ludum Dare
